author: Zachary Basu
title: Germany authorizes weapons for Ukraine in major reversal
description: Germany had previously opposed arming Ukraine due to its "historical responsibilities."
content:
Germany will allow the Netherlands to transfer 400 rocket-propelled grenade launchers to Ukraine, marking a major shift in Berlin's restrictive arms export policy, Politico first reported.
